id.description: ID of the record you are acting upon.

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

deposit.description: Amount of deposit made to this bill.
deposit.title: Deposit

paid_date.description: The paid date is the date on which a payment was sent to the supplier - YYYY-MM-DD.
paid_date.title: Paid date

po_number.description: A PO Number uniquely identifies a purchase order and is generally defined by the buyer. The buyer will match the PO number in the invoice to the Purchase Order.
po_number.title: Purchase Order number

total.description: Total amount of bill, including tax.
total.title: Total amount

total_tax.description: Total tax amount applied to this bill.
total_tax.title: Total tax amount

AccountingByRow.description: Indicates if accounting by row is used (true) or not (false). Accounting by row means that a separate ledger transaction is created for each row.
AccountingByRow.title: Accounting by Row

account_name.description: The name which you used in opening your bank account.
account_name.title: Bank Account Name

account_number.description: A bank account number is a number that is tied to your bank account. If you have several bank accounts, such as personal, joint, business (and so on), each account will have a different account number.
account_number.title: Bank Account Number

bank_code.description: A bank code is a code assigned by a central bank, a bank supervisory body or a Bankers Association in a country to all its licensed member banks or financial institutions.
bank_code.title: Bank Code

branch_identifier.description: A branch identifier is a unique identifier for a branch of a bank or financial institution.
branch_identifier.title: Branch Identifier

bsb_number.description: A BSB is a 6 digit numeric code used for identifying the branch of an Australian or New Zealand bank or financial institution.
bsb_number.title: BSB Number

routing_number.description: A routing number is a nine-digit code used to identify a financial institution in the United States.
routing_number.title: Routing number

Currency.description: Indicates the associated currency for an amount of money. Values correspond to [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).
Currency.title: Currency

Channel.description: The channel through which the transaction is processed.
Channel.title: Channel

CreatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was created.
CreatedAt.title: Created at (timestamp)

CreatedBy.description: The user who created the object.
CreatedBy.title: Created by

CurrencyRate.description: Currency Exchange Rate at the time entity was recorded/generated.
CurrencyRate.title: Currency Exchange Rate

CustomMappings.description: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.

DiscountPercentage.description: Discount percentage applied to this transaction.
DiscountPercentage.title: Discount Percentage

DownstreamId.description: The third-party API ID of original entity

DueDate.description: The due date is the date on which a payment is scheduled to be received - YYYY-MM-DD.
DueDate.title: Due date

Id.description: A unique identifier for an object.
Id.title: ID

Language.description: language code according to ISO 639-1. For the United States - EN

code.description: The code assigned to the account.
code.title: Code

id.description: The unique identifier for the account.
id.title: Account ID

nominal_code.description: The nominal code of the account.
nominal_code.title: Nominal Code

description.example: Model Y is a fully electric, mid-size SUV, with seating for up to seven, dual motor AWD and unparalleled protection.
description.title: Description

discount_amount.description: Discount amount applied to the line item when supported downstream.
discount_amount.title: Discount Amount

discount_percentage.description: Discount percentage applied to the line item when supported downstream.
discount_percentage.title: Discount Percentage

total_amount.description: Total amount of the line item
total_amount.title: Total amount

id.description: ID of the linked item. A reference to the [invoice item](https://developers.apideck.com/apis/accounting/reference#tag/Invoice-Items) that was used to create this line item
id.title: Item ID

RowVersion.description: A binary value used to detect updates to a object and prevent data conflicts. It is incremented each time an update is made to the object.
RowVersion.title: Row version

UnitOfMeasure.description: Description of the unit type the item is sold as, ie: kg, hour.
UnitOfMeasure.title: Unit of measure

UpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was last updated.
UpdatedAt.title: Updated at (timestamp)

UpdatedBy.description: The user who last updated the object.
UpdatedBy.title: Updated by

PaymentMethod.description: Payment method used for the transaction, such as cash, credit card, bank transfer, or check
PaymentMethod.title: Payment method

LinkedSupplier.description: The supplier this entity is linked to.

company_name.description: The company name of the supplier.
company_name.title: Company Name

display_id.description: The display ID of the supplier.
display_id.title: Display ID

display_name.description: The display name of the supplier.
display_name.title: Display Name

id.description: The ID of the supplier this entity is linked to.
id.title: Supplier ID

LinkedSupplier.title: LinkedSupplier

contact_name.description: Name of the contact person at the address

country.description: country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

county.description: Address field that holds a sublocality, such as a county

line1.description: Line 1 of the address e.g. number, street, suite, apt #, etc.

salutation.description: Salutation of the contact person at the address

string.description: The address string. Some APIs don't provide structured address data.

TaxCode.description: Applicable tax id/code override if tax is not supplied on a line item basis.
TaxCode.title: Tax Code
